Name: Clubland
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice & fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Go easy on the bitters, and this is a complex and rewarding Martini-style cocktail.
History: In William James "Billy" Tarling's 1937 Café Royal Bar Book , the creation of this drink is credited to one A. Mackintosh. Originally made with a brand of port called Clubland, hence this drink's name.
Nutrition: One serving of Clubland contains 165 calories
